name: Deadzone
overview: A one or two player shooter created by Holger Jansen and released in both 64'er Sonderheft 30, and 64'er Sonderheft 49. Save the universe! An action game of superlatives. Completely different game scenes confront you with a powerful opponent. In addition to the ability to react, you need a fair amount of thought and the right tactics to survive in this varied battle. A space adventure that also inspires professional players.
